    • Method Detail

      • sleepNanos

        public static void sleepNanos(long nanoDuration)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Spin-yield loop based alternative to Thread.sleep Based on the code of Andy Malakov http://andy-malakov.blogspot.fr/2010/06/alternative-to-threadsleep.html
        Parameters:
        nanoDuration - nonoseconds to sleep.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if thread interrupted.

      • printStackTrace

        public static final void printStackTrace()
        This method prints out the current stack trace.

      • setEventType

        public static final void setEventType(java.util.BitSet bSet,
                                      EventType eType)
        Encode the event type into the bit info word which will be in each evio block header.
        Parameters:
        bSet - bit set which will become part of the bit info word
        eType - event type to be encoded

      • setFirstEvent

        public static final void setFirstEvent(java.util.BitSet bSet)
        Encode the "is first event" into the bit info word which will be in evio block header.
        Parameters:
        bSet - bit set which will become part of the bit info word

      • unsetFirstEvent

        public static final void unsetFirstEvent(java.util.BitSet bSet)
        Encode the "is NOT first event" into the bit info word which will be in evio block header.
        Parameters:
        bSet - bit set which will become part of the bit info word

      • powerOfTwo

        public static final int powerOfTwo(int x,
                                   boolean roundUp)
        Return the power of 2 closest to the given argument.
        Parameters:
        x - value to get the power of 2 closest to.
        roundUp - if true, round up, else down
        Returns:
        -1 if x is negative or the closest power of 2 to value
